name: Tomb of Caw
description:
Some archaeologists found a tomb in the middle of nowhere but they had no idea who it was for. Now that you've been awakened, eliminate the intruders and escape your tomb.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Attack (Close range attack)

Left Shift - Hide
